description.content: New REST endpoints for Binance operations. These endpoints use Temporal workflows internally for robust execution.

Places a new order on Binance exchange using Temporal workflow.

**Input:** OrderRequest with symbol, side, type, quantity
**Output:** OrderResponse with order details or error

**Workflow:** BinancePlaceOrderWorkflow
**Activity:** PlaceOrder

**Note:** Requires valid Binance API keys to work. Will timeout without proper credentials.

exec: // Test response status (may be 200 or 500 depending on API keys)

description.content:
Retrieves the status of a specific order by orderId.

**Input:** orderId as path parameter, symbol as query parameter
**Output:** OrderResponse with current order status or error

**Workflow:** BinanceGetOrderStatusWorkflow
**Activity:** GetOrderStatus

**Note:** Requires valid Binance API keys to work. Will timeout without proper credentials.

description.content: Legacy workflow endpoints using POST method. These maintain backward compatibility with the original workflow implementation.

exec: // Set Binance API keys as environment variables (for service to read)
// ⚠️ IMPORTANT: Replace these with your actual Binance API keys
// Note: The Temporal service should read these from environment variables:
// Global test script - runs after every request

description.content: Base URL for the Temporal API service
Version of this Postman collection
Timestamp when tests were last run
Binance API Key - Replace with your actual API key
Binance Secret Key - Replace with your actual secret key
Use Binance Testnet (true) or Mainnet (false)

Collection for testing Temporal Binance workflows and REST endpoints implemented in the Afrikpay Gateway project.

**Base URL:** http://localhost:8088

**Endpoints:**
- GET /api/exchange/binance/v1/quotes - Get real-time crypto quotes
- GET /api/exchange/binance/v1/orders - Get all orders (mock data)
- POST /api/exchange/binance/v1/order - Place a new order
- GET /api/exchange/binance/v1/order/{orderId} - Get order status
- POST /api/workflow/v1/BinancePrice - Get single crypto price (legacy endpoint)

**Created:** June 30, 2025
**Version:** 1.1.0

Places a new order on Binance exchange using Temporal workflow.

**Input:** OrderRequest with symbol, side, type, quantity
**Output:** OrderResponse with order details or error

**Workflow:** BinancePlaceOrderWorkflow
**Activity:** PlaceOrder

**Note:** Requires valid Binance API keys to work. Will timeout without proper credentials.

exec: // Test response status (may be 200 or 500 depending on API keys)
